intro: Lapiedra, commonly known as stone plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Aizoaceae. It is native to southern Africa and is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and colorful, star-shaped flowers. Lapiedra species are also valued for their ornamental appeal and ease of care.
